Items.deck: Acting as a metaphor for addiction and escaping a hard reality through imagination, this depressing, though poignant game combines environmental manipulation and AI interaction to create a story-driven puzzle experience.

Items.deck: A remake of "Sinistar" the classic 80's arcade game. In this game the player is sucked through a wormhole and thrown into the universe of the Sinistar. Players must navigate 24 levels  in order to beat the game, and destroy gates and sinistars while they are at it.
Items.name: Sinistar Unleashed

Items.deck: Super Hang-On is the sequel to the praised Hang-On. There are two modes of play and several stages available in this motorcycle racing game.
Items.name: Super Hang-On

Items.deck: The third game in the award winning Thinkin’ Things edutainment series. This edition is aimed at an older age group than the previous entries and provide introductory knowledge of several economic and scientific concepts.
Items.name: Thinkin' Things Collection 3

Items.deck: Bomberman and Max rush to save the Charaboms and defeat the supercomputer Brain in over 80 stages. Red Challenger allows you to play as Max, while Blue Champion allows you to play as Bomberman.

Items.deck: Scream Machines allows you to build your own track layouts, and then go for a virtual ride.

Items.deck: The third game in the RPG series known in the west as Glory of Heracles. It was originally released on the Super Famicom in 1992, and eventually added to the Wii's Virtual Console library fifteen years later in 2007. It is the most famous entry in the series.
Items.name: Heracles no Eikou 3: Kamigami no Chinmoku

Items.deck: Deadliest Warrior: Legends is a 3D weapon-based fighting game and the sequel to Deadliest Warrior: The Game, trading generic fighters for actual historical warriors while adding new gameplay modes and mechanics.

Items.deck: Billed as a "cinematographic" adventure, Damn Virgins puts the player in the role of a protagonist of a short film. As the game progresses, FMV video clips revealing the plot of the film are unlocked.

Items.deck: Buffy stabs, jabs, and slings sarcastic quips in this third-person action adventure title based upon the popular television series.

Items.deck: Play as Attila and Genghis as you try to rescue Sonia Snake from the Nasty Nibbler in this sequel to Snake, Rattle, & Roll.

Items.deck: A jolly simulator for the Atari 2600 in which two ghosts play a friendly game of tennis.

Items.deck: Put your flying skills to the test by taking off from and landing on the busy flight deck of an aircraft carrier.

Items.deck: A 3D platformer for the Wii, developed over a period of about 10 years, during which many different companies contributed to some extent. The central mechanic is the ability to switch between three characters with different abilities.

Items.deck: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance is an updated version of Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty containing the original game while adding hundreds of VR missions, a theatre mode and more. It was originally released on the Xbox and later made it onto PS2 and PC.

Items.deck: A vertical scrolling shoot'em up for the Commodore 64 developed by David Cooper. First published in 1986 by Alpha-Omega Software and re-released in 1988 by The Power House.

Items.deck: The human race has polluted the Earth with Nuclear waste, the seas have risen and as I result land masses are now a series of islands (Archipelagos).  Many attempts were made to clean up the pollution but they failed and now it's up to you.

Items.deck: Championship Manager quiz is the game from the popular franchise "championship manager" which instead of playing the math you answer questions to progress around the pitch. It features over 4,000 soccer related questions for any young or old soccer fan
Items.name: Championship Manager Quiz

Items.name: The Amazing Fantastics

Items.deck: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's legendary detective Sherlock Holmes has met his greatest foe: French gentleman burglar Arsène Lupin. The game follows Maurice LeBlanc's penultimate creation as he continuously challenges England's finest to a duel of wits over the nation's most treasured assets.
Items.name: Sherlock Holmes: Nemesis
